blocks.content: Define an opposite category, which is the same as the original category but with the direction of arrows the other way around. Definition 3.5 of [Adamek] p. 25. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)

thm oppcval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(chom, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cco, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(coppc, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))))), cfv(coppc, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(coppc, c0), co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, coppc, co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))))), co(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, cv(hs0))))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))))))
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, cv(hs0))))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))), co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)))), c0, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq2d(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, cv(hs0))), ctpos(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  tposeqd(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(chom, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, chom)
  opeq2d(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))), cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sqxpeqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  tposeqd(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cco, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cco, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cco)
  df-oppc(hs0, s0, s1)
  ovex(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c3))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(s0, s1, cxp(c4, c4), c4, ctpos(co(cop(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), c5, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm oppcval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =((c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Hom ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(comp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(oppCat ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, ((c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>), (oppCat ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (oppCat ` c0)=((c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, coppc, ((c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>), ((hs0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos((Hom ` hs0))>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà((Base ` hs0)√ó(Base ` hs0)), s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[(comp ` hs0)](1st ` s0))))>))
  oveq12d((hs0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos((Hom ` hs0))>), csts, <(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà((Base ` hs0)√ó(Base ` hs0)), s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[(comp ` hs0)](1st ` s0))))>, (c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>), <(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>, hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d(hs0, csts, <(Hom ` ndx), tpos((Hom ` hs0))>, c0, <(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>, hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  opeq2d((Hom ` ndx), tpos((Hom ` hs0)), tpos(c3), hs0 = c0)
  tposeqd((Hom ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Hom ` hs0), c3, (Hom ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, chom)
  opeq2d((comp ` ndx), (s0 ‚àà((Base ` hs0)√ó(Base ` hs0)), s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[(comp ` hs0)](1st ` s0)))), (s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0)))), hs0 = c0)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, ((Base ` hs0)√ó(Base ` hs0)), (Base ` hs0), tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[(comp ` hs0)](1st ` s0))), (c4 √ó c4), c4, tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))), hs0 = c0)
  sqxpeqd((Base ` hs0), c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c4, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  tposeqd((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[(comp ` hs0)](1st ` s0)), (< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0)), hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(< s1,(2nd ` s0)>, (comp ` hs0), (1st ` s0), c5, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((comp ` hs0), c5, (comp ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cco)
  df-oppc(hs0, s0, s1)
  ovex((c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>), csts, <(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c3)>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà(c4 √ó c4), s1 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶ tpos((< s1,(2nd ` s0)>[c5](1st ` s0))))>))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)

  |- wceq(ctpos(c0), cfv(chom, c1))

  pm2.61i(wceq(ctpos(c0), cfv(chom, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  3eqtr4a(ctpos(c0), cfv(chom, c1), cfv(chom, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c0)))), cfv(chom, co(co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c0))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cfv(cco, c2), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  setsnid(chom, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c0))), cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cfv(cco, c2), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))))
  mpbir(wne(cfv(chom, cnx), cfv(cco, cnx)), wne(cdc(nat1, nat4), cdc(nat1, nat5)))
  ltneii(cdc(nat1, nat4), cdc(nat1, nat5))
  nnrei(cdc(nat1, nat4))
  decnncl(nat1, nat4)
  4nn()
  declt(nat1, nat4, nat5)
  1nn0()
  4nn0()
  5nn()
  4lt5()
  neeq12i(cfv(chom, cnx), cfv(cco, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat4), cdc(nat1, nat5))
  homndx()
  ccondx()
  mpan2(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(ctpos(c0), cfv(chom, co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c0))))), wcel(ctpos(c0), universe))
  tposex(c0)
  fvexi(c0, chom, c2)
  setsid(c2, universe, ctpos(c0), universe, chom)
  homid()
  fveq2d(chom, c1, co(co(c2, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(c0))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cfv(cco, c2), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  oppcval(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cco, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cco, c2))
  3eqtr4a(ctpos(c0), cfv(chom, c1), ctpos(emptycls), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  tpos0()
  tposeqd(c0, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(chom, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, chom)
  syl6eqr(cfv(chom, c1), emptycls, cfv(chom, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fveq2d(chom, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(coppc, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, coppc)
  str0(chom, cdc(nat1, nat4))
  df-hom()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

thm oppchomfval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ tpos(c0)=(Hom ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Hom ` c2)

  ccondx()
  mpan2(c2 ‚àà ùïå, tpos(c0)=(Hom `(c2[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c0)>)), tpos(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  tposex(c0)
  fvexi(c0, chom, c2)

  fveq2d(chom, c1, ((c2[sSet]<(Hom ` ndx), tpos(c0)>)[sSet]<(comp ` ndx),(hs0 ‚àà((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c2)), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚Ü¶ tpos((< hs1,(2nd ` hs0)>[(comp ` c2)](1st ` hs0))))>), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  oppcval(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c1, c0, (Base ` c2), (comp ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((comp ` c2))
  3eqtr4a(tpos(c0), (Hom ` c1), tpos(‚àÖ), emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))

} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, cop(c0, c1), cfv(cco, c2), c3, ctpos(co(cop(c3, c1), c4, c0)), cxp(c5, c5), c5, ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))), universe, w0)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cco, c2), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(c5, c5), c5, ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))), cfv(cco, co(co(c6, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, c6)))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(c5, c5), c5, ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))))), w0)
  fveq2d(cco, c2, co(co(c6, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, c6)))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(c5, c5), c5, ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))))), w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(c2, co(co(c6, csts, cop(cfv(chom, cnx), ctpos(cfv(chom, c6)))), csts, cop(cfv(cco, cnx), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cxp(c5, c5), c5, ctpos(co(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c6, universe))
  eleq2s(c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c6), wcel(c6, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cbs, c6)
